evidence.claim: Taro Health utilizes AWS services for serverless architecture and data storage.
The company adheres to HIPAA standards, ensuring secure handling of health data.
Integration with EHR systems supports HL7 FHIR standards for interoperability.
They have mentioned the use of REST APIs for integrating with third-party health services.

icp.icp_reason: No evidence found of X12 transactions or clearinghouse capabilities on their site.
